009package imagingbook.pub.color.image;
010
011import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.max;
012import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.min;
013
014import java.util.Arrays;
015import java.util.Random;
016
017/**
018 * Methods for converting between RGB and HLS color spaces.
019 * @author W. Burger
020 * @version 2021/09/24
021*/
022public class HlsConverter {
023        
024        public HlsConverter() { 
025        }
026
027        @Deprecated
028        public float[] RGBtoHLS (int[] RGB) {
029                return fromRGB(RGB);
030        }
031        
032        public float[] fromRGB (int[] RGB) {
033                final int R = RGB[0], G = RGB[1], B = RGB[2]; // R, G, B assumed to be in [0,255]
034                final int cHi = max(R, G, B);           // max. component value
035                final int cLo = min(R, G, B);           // min. component value
036                final int cRng = cHi - cLo;                     // component range
037                
038                // Calculate lightness L
039                float L = ((cHi + cLo) / 255f) / 2;
040                
041                // Calculate saturation S               
042                float S = 0;
043                if (0 < L && L < 1) {
044                        float d = (L <= 0.5f) ? L : (1 - L);
045                        S = 0.5f * (cRng / 255f) / d;
046                }
047                
048                // Calculate hue H (same as in HSV)
049                float H = 0;    
050                if (cHi > 0 && cRng > 0) {        // a color pixel
051                        float r = (float)(cHi - R) / cRng;
052                        float g = (float)(cHi - G) / cRng;
053                        float b = (float)(cHi - B) / cRng;
054                        float h;
055                        if (R == cHi)                      // R is largest component
056                                h = b - g;
057                        else if (G == cHi)                 // G is largest component
058                                h = r - b + 2.0f;
059                        else                               // B is largest component
060                                h = g - r + 4.0f;
061                        if (h < 0)
062                          h = h + 6;
063                        H = h / 6;
064                }
065                return new float[] {H, L, S};
066        }
067        
068        @Deprecated
069        public int[] HLStoRGB (float[] HLS) {
070                return toRGB(HLS);
071        }
072        
073        public int[] toRGB (float[] HLS) {
074                final float H = HLS[0], L = HLS[1], S = HLS[2]; // H,L,S in [0,1]
075                float r = 0, g = 0, b = 0;      
076                if (L <= 0)                             // black
077                        r = g = b = 0;
078                else if (L >= 1)                // white
079                        r = g = b = 1;
080                else {
081                        float hh = (6 * H) % 6;
082                        int   c1 = (int) hh;
083                        float c2 = hh - c1;
084                        float d = (L <= 0.5f) ? (S * L) : (S * (1 - L));
085                        float w = L + d;
086                        float x = L - d;
087                        float y = w - (w - x) * c2;
088                        float z = x + (w - x) * c2;
089                        switch (c1) {
090                                case 0: r = w; g = z; b = x; break;
091                                case 1: r = y; g = w; b = x; break;
092                                case 2: r = x; g = w; b = z; break;
093                                case 3: r = x; g = y; b = w; break;
094                                case 4: r = z; g = x; b = w; break;
095                                case 5: r = w; g = x; b = y; break;
096                        }                       
097                }       // r, g, b in [0,1]
098                int R = min(Math.round(r * 255), 255);
099                int G = min(Math.round(g * 255), 255);
100                int B = min(Math.round(b * 255), 255);
101                return new int[] {R, G, B};
102        }
103        
104        public static void main(String[] args) {        // TODO: move to unit tests!
105                doCheck(new int[] {0, 0, 0});
106                doCheck(new int[] {255, 255, 255});
107                doCheck(new int[] {177, 0, 0});
108                doCheck(new int[] {0, 177, 0});
109                doCheck(new int[] {0, 0, 177});
110                doCheck(new int[] {19, 3, 174});
111                Random rd = new Random();
112                for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
113                        int r = rd.nextInt(256);
114                        int g = rd.nextInt(256);
115                        int b = rd.nextInt(256);
116                        doCheck(new int[] {r, g, b});
117                }
118        }
119        
120        private static void doCheck(int[] rgb1) {
121                HlsConverter hlsC = new HlsConverter();
122//              System.out.println();
123//              System.out.println("rgb1 = " + Arrays.toString(rgb1));
124                float[] hsv = hlsC.RGBtoHLS(rgb1);
125//              System.out.println("hsv = " + Arrays.toString(hsv));
126                int[] rgb2 = hlsC.HLStoRGB(hsv);
127//              System.out.println("rgb2 = " + Arrays.toString(rgb2));
128                if (rgb1[0] != rgb2[0] || rgb1[1] != rgb2[1] || rgb1[1] != rgb2[1]) {
129                        System.out.println("** problem with " + Arrays.toString(rgb1) + " -> " + Arrays.toString(rgb2));
130                }
131        }
132
133}
